articles.title: How AI is turning digital transformation into a brand-building superpower
articles.author: Sameer Sankhe
articles.summary: Starbucks uses its Deep Brew engine to recommend offers based on purchase history, enhancing user experience. Coca-Cola launched the 'Create Real Magic' campaign, using generative AI to produce numerous fan-made ads. Zepto utilizes AI for real-time need fulfillment and UX customization, improving their service and building customer habits.

articles.title: NP Digital expands client base and AI capabilities
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: NP Digital Australia secured new clients including Gallagher Security, Family Doctor, Soudal Australia, Zero Latency, Henry Bucks and City Hatters. These clients engaged NP Digital for multi-channel services like SEO, paid media, and content strategy. Zero Latency chose NP Digital for their strategic thinking and delivery across channels.

articles.title: Co-op to launch chain of micro food-to-go stores
articles.author: Alice Leader
articles.summary: Co-op is launching a new chain of micro stores focused on food-to-go, with the first store opening in Solihull and plans for 15 more in the coming months. These stores will feature a varied selection of food and drink, including new deli options, Co-op Irresistible pizzas cooked on demand, and a range of hot and cold drinks, targeting the foodservice sector and quick commerce operations.

articles.title: Winnipeg-based TV ad delivery firm Taiv switches on at home
articles.author: Aaron Epp
articles.summary: Taiv Inc. has launched its advertising technology product in Winnipeg, Canada, which connects to TVs and switches between cable, streaming, and digital signage during commercial breaks. The product, already in use in over 2,000 locations in the US, is provided to businesses free of charge, with Taiv generating revenue by selling ads and sharing a portion with the businesses. Several businesses in Winnipeg have already signed up and are using the Taiv technology to advertise their products and events.

articles.title: Colorado-Based Review Zaps Champions Businesses Everywhere with Google Review-Boosting Products
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Review Zaps, a Colorado-based company, offers products like the Zappy Google Review Stand and Review Zaps. These products aim to connect businesses and customers, helping companies to improve their Google reviews.

articles.title: Giveon Takes His New Album on the Road
articles.summary: Spotify has launched a new AI playlist feature that allows users to create unique playlists based on natural language prompts, moods, genres, and artists. This tool uses artificial intelligence to understand user preferences and provide a more personalized music discovery experience.

articles.title: How to Use the BlendSmart Brush
articles.author: Chinea Rodriguez
articles.summary: BlendSmart is a battery-powered makeup applicator with interchangeable heads designed for easier and faster makeup blending. It can be used with powder, liquid, and cream products. The company recommends using a light hand and a little product for optimal results.

articles.title: Hyper3D Unveils Revolutionary Rodin AI Suite, Instantly Generating 3D Models from Text and Images
articles.author: pressadvantage
articles.summary: Deemos Tech has launched Rodin ProRefine, an AI creation suite within the Hyper3D platform, enabling users to generate 3D models, textures, and videos from text or images. The suite includes tools like a 3D model generator and offers features such as text-to-3D model and image-to-3D conversion. It is available through subscription plans, including a free trial.

articles.title: Mister Car Wash Announces Second Quarter 2025 Results
articles.summary: Mister Car Wash, Inc. announced the opening of 4 new greenfield locations in the second quarter of 2025, bringing their total operated locations to 522 as of June 30, 2025. This represents a 6% increase compared to the 491 locations operated as of June 30, 2024.

articles.title: The next Nintendo Direct has been announced – here's when and where you can watch it
articles.author: Rhys Wood
articles.summary: Nintendo announced a Nintendo Direct Partner Showcase taking place on July 31, 2025. The showcase will be 25 minutes long and will feature third-party Switch 2 releases.

articles.title: Your 90-Day New Product Mission
articles.author: Amazon Ads
articles.summary: Amazon Ads provides New Product Campaigns, designed as a launchpad for modern brands, covering aspects from discoverability to optimization. The campaigns utilize Amazon's historical data to provide insights into effective strategies for launching new products and expanding existing marketplace catalogs. These campaigns offer features like out-of-stock prevention and full-funnel advertising solutions to help businesses achieve their marketing goals.

articles.title: Meghan Markle launches ANOTHER product in her As Ever line... but customers may struggle to see what's new
articles.author: LILLIAN GISSEN
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's brand, As Ever, is launching its 2024 Napa Valley Rosé, a new vintage of its previously released wine. Available for purchase next week, the new rosé is expected to taste similar to the 2023 vintage, with notes described as an elegant medley of delicate yet memorable flavor, and is intended for enjoying during the summer. The company also received positive feedback for its initial 2023 rosé with reviews such as '10 out of 10' and 'elevated flavor.'

articles.title: Savings Spotlight: Get 40% off a Fanttik camping tent that sets up in 60 seconds
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Fanttik launched a new eight-person camping tent on Amazon in late March 2025. The tent features a quick pop-up design with pre-attached poles, measures 13 feet by 9 feet, and includes a zippered divider for privacy.

articles.title: Astrocade Rolls Out AI Agent-Powered Game Creation Experience; Opening the Door for Everyone to ...
articles.author: Astrocade
articles.summary: Astrocade launched its re-imagined AI-powered social gaming platform, featuring AI-guided brainstorming, in-game editors, and remix capabilities. This new product aims to simplify game creation and offer a unique interactive experience for casual gamers.

articles.title: LG launches social media event for its tumbler-cleaning myCup
articles.author: Top Picks 주식
articles.summary: LG Electronics announced a social media promotion for myCup, a new appliance designed for washing reusable tumblers. The promotion runs until August 27.

articles.title: DigiKey Expands Inventory with Over 32,000 Stocking NPIs in Q2 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: DigiKey expanded its product offerings by adding over 32,000 new product introductions (NPIs) in Q2 2025. The company's total portfolio grew by more than 236,000 new products with the addition of 127 new suppliers. This expansion brings DigiKey's overall portfolio to over 16.5 million products.

articles.title: Stop scrolling: We found hidden Amazon deals worth up to 65% off
articles.author: Rachel Cortez
articles.summary: Amazon Prime offers members benefits such as same-day, one-day, and two-day delivery options on millions of products. Other perks include special access to sales and lightning deals, discounts on groceries, free Grubhub+, and Prime Fuel savings. Signing up for Amazon Prime allows users to immediately access these benefits.

articles.title: AI/R Company Launches Synsig, a Business Unit Specialized in ServiceNow
articles.author: Synsig
articles.summary: AI Revolution Company (AI/R) has launched Synsig, a brand focused on implementing Digital Platforms and Agentic AI using ServiceNow. Synsig aims to bring digital transformation to areas like CRM, HR, AI agents, and IT services, leveraging AI/R's expertise in AI and platform engineering.

articles.title: The domestic upgrade: When washing became a smarter chore
articles.author: Ayman Anika
articles.summary: Walton is incorporating technologies like AirWash, OxyFresh, IoT, and AI into their washing machines to enhance performance and efficiency. Jamuna Electronics offers fully automatic machines with cycles for various fabrics, focusing on convenience and reducing manual work. These innovations cater to evolving consumer needs for smarter and more efficient appliances.

articles.title: Amazon is selling an ‘excellent' $2,199 laptop for $600, and shoppers love its 'responsive' touchscreen
articles.author: Jon Winkler
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a discount on the Lenovo Ideapad Touchscreen Laptop. This allows customers to purchase the laptop at a reduced price.

articles.title: 5 Best Drugstore Moisturizers for Juicy Skin on a Budget
articles.author: Annie Blackman
articles.summary: The article highlights several drugstore moisturizers from different companies, including Vanicream Moisturizing Cream, La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Cocokind Electrolyte Water Cream, Olay Super Cream with Sunscreen SPF 30, and Naturium Dew-Glow Moisturizer SPF 50. It details their key ingredients, benefits, and tester feedback, emphasizing their efficacy and suitability for various skin types and concerns.

articles.title: Aldi's Smart and Stylish $15 Bamboo Organizer is the Space-Saving Kitchen Tool of the Season
articles.author: Nathan Hutsenpiller
articles.summary: Aldi is launching the Kirkton House Bamboo Organizer on August 6th, priced at $14.99. The organizer is made of bamboo, features four rearrangeable compartments, and is suitable for organizing utensils in the kitchen.

articles.title: Nonaste® Brings Eco-Powered Pet Care to SuperZoo 2025
articles.author: Nonaste
articles.summary: Nonaste is launching two new pet-care products: Aloe Glow™ Pet Shampoo and Enzyme Pet Stain & Odor Eliminator. These products will be unveiled at SuperZoo 2025 in Las Vegas from August 13-15.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland fans rushing to buy new beauty dupe in stores now – and it's €66 cheaper
articles.author: Lauren Kelly
articles.summary: ALDI Ireland has launched Lacura's Honey Hair Perfume, a dupe for Gisou's Wildflower Honey product. The Lacura Hair Perfume is priced at €5.75 and is available in stores while stocks last.

articles.title: Made in Chorley: The story of the Droyt Soap Factory
articles.author: Lucinda Herbert
articles.summary: Droyts Soap Factory, operating since the 1950s, manufactures traditional glycerine soap. Originally producing only two types of soap, the company now offers over 30 varieties and custom formulations. Their glycerine soap is vegan-friendly, cruelty-free, and suitable for all skin types.

articles.title: This breakfast sandwich maker is 'better than my local drive-thru' — and it's on sale on Amazon
articles.author: Yahoo Canada Shopping Editors
articles.summary: Hamilton Beach has launched the Breakfast Sandwich Maker, a device designed to streamline the morning routine. This sandwich maker cooks a breakfast sandwich in five minutes and is easy to clean. It costs $40 and is available at Amazon.

articles.title: Next's "stylish" jeans which "look and feel amazing" reduced to just €23 in sale
articles.author: Ruairi Scott Byrne
articles.summary: Next is offering Dart Detail Barrel 100% Cotton Jeans, featuring a barrel-leg design with darts for a complimentary fit. Originally priced at €58, these jeans are now available in Next's clearance sale for €23, representing a 60% discount. Customer reviews on Next's website highlight the jeans' style and value.

articles.title: I Tried 15 Quince Dresses, and This One Is My Favorite
articles.author: Brenley Goertzen
articles.summary: Quince offers a diverse range of dresses under $100, including cotton and linen options, such as the Fit & Flare Midi dress priced at $80. The Fit & Flare Midi dress is made of 100 percent linen, features an A-line skirt, a smocked back panel, and hidden side pockets.

articles.title: GPT-5 Launch Might Be Imminent: More Leaks Detail Some Of The New AI's Main Features
articles.summary: OpenAI is anticipated to launch GPT-5, a next-generation ChatGPT model, potentially in early August. GPT-5 is rumored to support context windows of up to 1 million tokens (input) and up to 100,000 tokens (output), and will support the Model Context Protocol (MCP). Testers are already using alpha versions, with codenames including Nectarine, Lobster, and Starfish.

articles.title: Exploring Your Creative Genius: There's Magic in Solving Your Own Problem
articles.author: Carl Nordgren
articles.summary: Charles Johnson, after struggling with razor bumps, created a solution. Following positive feedback, Johnson turned his fix into a business, effectively launching a new product designed to address razor bumps.

articles.title: Celebrate National Orgasm Day with the blush that put Nars on the map
articles.author: Emma North
articles.summary: NARS is celebrating National Orgasm Day by highlighting its Orgasm Powder Blush, a popular peachy-pink blush since 1999. NARS offers a range of Orgasm-inspired products including the Nars Afterglow Lip Balm, a lightweight Liquid Blush, and a bundle containing the Nars Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation and the Orgasm Powder Blush.

articles.title: After the iPhone Fold, it's time Apple joined the flip phone club
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: Apple is considering developing an "iPhone Flip," a flip-style foldable phone, potentially launching after the iPhone Fold. This device aims to offer a more affordable foldable option, possibly incorporating the thinness of the iPhone 17 Air and new iOS widgets optimized for cover screens. The anticipated launch for the iPhone Flip is speculated around September 2027.

articles.title: How Niche Businesses Use Innovation To Outmaneuver Industry Giants
articles.author: David Henkin
articles.summary: Dr. Squatch, a men's personal care brand, launched a new product line of natural soap for men. The company experienced significant growth, evolving from a niche product to a $100M+ brand through digital storytelling and agile product development. This success enabled the brand to tap into a previously ignored market segment, while legacy players struggled to adapt.

articles.title: Conquer sweat and smells from your pits to your bits with the 'miracle in a tube' body wash that provides 24 HOURS of odor control
articles.author: TANYA SHARMA
articles.summary: Lume introduces Lume Acidified Body Wash, a product clinically proven to prevent odors for 24 hours and reduce hyperpigmentation. This body wash lowers the skin's pH to stop odor-causing bacteria and is available in various fragrances like Clean Tangerine and Lavender Sage.

articles.title: Save 20% on Noco Boost Plus GB40 Jump Starter This Cyber Monday
articles.author: Billy Cadden
articles.summary: Noco is offering the Noco Boost Plus GB40 portable jump starter at a discounted price of $88. The GB40 features 1000 amps of current, enough for 20 jump starts, a USB charging port, and a seven-mode LED flashlight, and it is suitable for gasoline engines up to six liters and diesel engines up to three.

articles.title: Google expands AI Mode with PDF uploads, Canvas planner and more
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google is introducing new features for its AI Mode in Search, including PDF uploads for asking questions about documents, a dynamic Canvas planner for organizing tasks, and deeper integration with Chrome and Google Lens.  Additionally, Google is launching Search Live, a real-time video input feature integrated with Google Lens for visual search.

articles.title: ShopMy Launches Shopping Platform: A Personalized Destination Built by the Creators You Trust
articles.author: Shop My Shelf
articles.summary: ShopMy launched its consumer shopping platform. The platform introduces Circles, a feature allowing shoppers to curate their own shop using trusted creators' recommendations.

articles.title: 没你的好玩
articles.summary: POP MART Official Online Store sells 可乐labubu, potentially a Coca-Cola themed Labubu toy, through Amazon.

articles.title: Why Cold Outreach Still Works in 2025
articles.summary: A B2B SaaS company launched a new product feature, and the author saw an opportunity for their cold outreach service. The author contacted the CEO and successfully turned the outreach into a $30K project. The article promotes using short, relevant, and personalized emails to generate leads in 2025.

articles.title: MySize Launches NaizGPT - Conversational AI Assistant for Retail Teams
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: MySize Inc. launched NaizGPT, a conversational AI assistant designed for retail teams, enabling them to interact with data using natural language. Currently being tested by select teams using the Naiz Fit platform, it is expected to be commercially available in Q4 2025, with plans to integrate it with MySize's Smart Catalog technology.

articles.title: OpenLegacy Hub is now available in the new AWS Marketplace AI Agents and Tools category
articles.author: Open Legacy
articles.summary: OpenLegacy Hub is now available in the AWS Marketplace within the new AI Agents and Tools category. This allows customers to discover, buy, and deploy OpenLegacy's platform for modernizing legacy systems into cloud-based AI workflows using their AWS accounts. The integration aims to accelerate agent and agentic workflow development.

articles.title: AI Business Models: Transforming Enterprise for the Future
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: The article discusses the rise of AI business models and key trends. Companies like Tesla with Autopilot, Adobe with Sensei, and PathAI are discussed as examples for productization of AI. Google Cloud AI Platform, Amazon SageMaker, and Microsoft Azure AI examples of AI as a service.

articles.title: 40 Products You'll Ask How You Lived Without For So Long
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener with a color-adapting formula. Anua introduced heartleaf pore-clearing cleansing oil designed to eliminate makeup residue. WD-40 released a pen for precise application, while Elizabeth Mott launched Thank Me Later Eye Primer to ensure smoky eye makeup lasts longer.

articles.title: Xcel Brands and TSC Product Lab Partner to Launch Products under the Trust. Respect. Love By ...
articles.author: Xcel Brands
articles.summary: Xcel Brands and TSC Product Lab have partnered to launch a new line of elevated pet products under the Trust. Respect. Love by Cesar Millan brand. The product line will include smart electronic devices and small appliances developed with pet wellbeing and human-animal harmony in mind.

articles.title: Lenovo Yoga Tab Plus Review: One of the Best Android Tablets Right Now
articles.summary: The Lenovo Yoga Tab Plus is a new Android tablet featuring a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, up to 16GB RAM, and a 12.7-inch IPS LCD display. It comes with both the Tab Pen Pro and a keyboard. The tablet includes Lenovo AI Now, an AI assistant for basic tasks and offers strong performance for gaming and multitasking.

articles.title: Fossibot F109S Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Fossibot announced the F109S smartphone in Q4 2024, a 5G-ready device with a 10600 mAh battery and 18W wired charging. The phone features a 6.75-inch display, MediaTek Dimensity 6100+ processor, 6GB RAM, 256GB storage, and a dual-camera setup with a 50MP main sensor. It runs on Android 15 and includes connectivity options like Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5.2, NFC, and USB Type-C.

articles.title: Meltwater Unveils GenAI Lens To Expose Brand Mentions In AI Chatbots
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Meltwater has launched GenAI Lens, a new tool designed to allow brands to see how they are portrayed across major AI assistants and large language models. This aims to address a gap for marketing, PR, and communications teams, giving brands visibility into how they are perceived within generative AI platforms.

articles.title: [Watch] Nasi Minyak, Rendang And Gulai Kuning In A Pouch: Malaysia's Ready-to-Eat Revolution
articles.author: Fernando Fong
articles.summary: YP Retort has launched ready-to-eat meals utilizing retort technology, offering convenient, safe, and long-lasting meal options with authentic Malaysian dishes. These retort meals cater to busy lifestyles and provide a backup plan for those seeking convenient and tasty food.

articles.title: LTIMindtree Partners with Adobe to Launch BlueVerse CraftStudio: A New-Age Marketing Agency Built to Help Clients Maximize and Accelerate AI-driven Marketing ROI
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: LTIMindtree has launched BlueVerse CraftStudio, a next-generation agency that leverages Adobe's AI-powered innovations to streamline marketing operations. CraftStudio helps marketing teams break through barriers to AI adoption and business value realization, offering a team of experts leveraging Adobe solutions.

articles.title: Dyson Airstrait review: After 18 months of use, I wouldn't be without this wet-to-dry styler
articles.author: Britta O'Boyle
articles.summary: Dyson Airstrait is a wet-to-dry hair styler that uses high-pressure airflow to straighten hair with less damage. It has Wet and Dry modes with preset temperatures and airflow settings. It is compared with GHD Duet Style which uses a combination of airflow and hot plates.

articles.title: Edgen Introduces Subscription Model and Expands Language Support for Global Users  Jul. 30, 2025 11:03
articles.summary: Edgen, an AI-driven market intelligence platform, has launched a new multitiered subscription model, including Free, Pro, and Expert versions. Simultaneously, Edgen has expanded its supported interface languages to include Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Vietnamese, Spanish, Turkish, and French, in addition to English.

articles.title: 27 Products Reviewers Say Are "Cooling"
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article showcases various cooling products, including the Neutrogena Hydro Boost Body Moisturizing Gel Cream with hyaluronic acid, Burt's Bees After Sun Soother with aloe and coconut oil, and the Dettol creamy shower gel with menthol. Additionally, it features Hanes boxers with X-Temp cooling technology and Fruit of the Loom underwear designed to keep the wearer dry and comfortable.

articles.title: 34 Cleaning Products That'll Make People Think You Hired A Professional
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: A cleaning tool effectively cleans bathroom grout and removes soap scum. BuzzFeed Shopping Editor Natalie Brown noted the tool's ability to restore grout to its original color with minimal effort and quickly remove soap scum from bathtubs.

articles.title: LG launches social media event for its tumbler-cleaning myCup
articles.summary: LG Electronics announced a promotion for myCup, a new appliance for washing reusable tumblers. The promotion is scheduled to run until August 27.

articles.title: Verizon Will Give You a Free $1.1K Galaxy Z Flip7—but You've Gotta Give Them Something in Return
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Verizon is offering the newly released Samsung Galaxy Z Flip7 for free to customers who trade in a qualifying Apple, Google, or Samsung device and subscribe to their Unlimited Ultimate plan. The plan costs $100 per month for a single line and requires a 36-month commitment. An upgrade to the 512GB version of the Z Flip7 is available for an additional $3.32 per month.

articles.title: Flexprice Secures Pre-Seed Funding to Develop Open-Source Billing for AI and Agentic Businesses
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Flexprice launched its open-source billing and metering platform, designed for the AI-first economy. The platform offers features like developer-centric tools, flexible pricing support, and enhanced transparency. TDV Partners has invested in Flexprice, recognizing its potential in the AI monetization market.

articles.title: New Hope's August fireworks over the Delaware River schedule; drone show added to fireworks
articles.author: Michele Haddon
org: The Greater New Hope Chamber of
articles.summary: The New Hope Summer Series in 2025 is expanding its offerings with a new season-long drone show. Additionally, visitors can use the Pyrocast app with the code 'F683' to synchronize the fireworks and drone show soundtrack with their own Bluetooth speakers, providing an immersive experience.

articles.title: Hebbia's Adam Khakhar: AI is creating two-person companies that scale
articles.author: Diane Brady
articles.summary: Adam Khakhar and Morten Bruun created FlashDocs, a B2B software-as-a-service that uses AI to turn prompts into branded slide decks. The company quickly acquired enterprise clients like Amazon before being sold to Hebbia. FlashDocs provided service of instantly converting AI prompts into slide decks.

articles.title: Dyson vacuum that 'brings up a lot of dirt from carpets' cut by £150
articles.author: Ian Craig
articles.summary: Dyson's V8 Absolute vacuum cleaner boasts 115 air watts of suction powered by a Hyperdymium digital motor, offering up to 40 minutes of cordless operation. It features a detangling cleaner head for pet hair and seven attachments and is currently on sale for £249.99. Customer reviews highlight its powerful performance and ease of use, with some expressing concerns about battery life.

articles.title: Save 30% off eco laundry essential that costs 6p per wash
articles.author: Brijiena Lovelace
articles.summary: Re:gn is offering 30% off the first pack of their bestselling laundry sheets, which are plant-based, biodegradable, vegan, and cruelty-free. These concentrated sheets are available in scented and unscented options and dissolve in the wash, providing a waste-free laundry solution.

articles.title: Motorola Launches moto g86 Power with Segment-Best 1.5K pOLED, 50MP OIS Camera, Dimensity 7400, 6720mAh Battery at Rs. 16,999
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the moto g86 POWER, a new smartphone in the g-series, featuring a 6.67' 1.5K pOLED Super HD display, a 50MP OIS Sony LYTIA 600 camera, and a massive 6720mAh battery. The device will be available for purchase starting August 6th, 2025, on Flipkart, Motorola.in, and leading retail stores, with a launch price of Rs. 16,999.

articles.title: New Oriental Announces Results for the Fourth Fiscal Quarter and the Fiscal Year Ended May 31, 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
org: New Oriental Education & Technology Group Inc
articles.summary: New Oriental launched a new generation of AI-powered Intelligent Learning Devices and introduced an AI-driven Smart Study Solution. This integration of new technologies into the company's offline and online products has strengthened product capabilities. Furthermore, innovative technologies have been developed to support daily operations for teachers and staff, enhancing operational efficiency and service satisfaction.

articles.title: 'Game changer' cordless vacuum cleaner is £79
articles.author: Ian Craig GAU Content Editor
articles.summary: Linkifly is offering the XT1 cordless vacuum on Amazon for a discounted price. Shark has a bundle featuring a Stratos anti-hair wrap cordless vacuum and a Klik n' Flip steam mop available at a reduced price. Dyson is offering the V8 Absolute vacuum for a sale price on their website.

articles.title: Yext and Scout: Boosting Brand Visibility in ChatGPT
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: OpenAI is launching a new AI model called GPT-4o for ChatGPT, alongside a desktop version of ChatGPT with an updated user interface.  Future plans include allowing users to video chat with the AI model.  This introduction of GPT-4o and associated features represents a new product/service launch by OpenAI.

articles.title: Vogue sparks fury with AI model ad that enforces 'impossible beauty standards'
articles.author: Ella Kipling
articles.summary: Guess has launched an advertisement featuring AI models in Vogue magazine. Seraphinne Vallora, created an AI model for Guess's summer campaign. The use of AI models has sparked debate about beauty standards and the impact on mental health.

articles.title: ⚡Know Moto G86 Power 5G Price, Sale Date, Specifications and Features
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Moto G86 Power 5G, the newest member of its G series, in India. This new phone features a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 processor, LPDDR4X RAM, a larger battery, and a 50MP primary camera.

articles.title: 2025 AI Expo Opens in Suzhou, Highlighting Innovation in AI Industry Development  Jul. 30, 2025 06:37
org: New Generation AI Industry Technology Innovation Strategic Alliance
articles.summary: The AI Product & Application Expo featured over 20 high-profile product launches. A "Black Tech" experience zone was introduced, showcasing over 200 cutting-edge technologies from over 20 companies. The zone included on-site purchasing options.

articles.title: P&G Korea supports Gen Z job seekers
articles.author: Ko Dong-Hwan
articles.summary: P&G Korea is leveraging celebrity endorsements to market its products to younger demographics. K-pop star Jang Won-young is the new face of Downy laundry detergent and fabric softener, while YouTuber Ralral represents the Pampers baby diaper brand.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 is the new Lamborghini of phones
articles.author: Mark Furler
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a foldable smartphone featuring a thinner design, improved battery life, and enhanced camera capabilities. The phone boasts a 200MP main camera with AI-powered imaging technologies and offers features like object removal and portrait studio for editing photos on its 8-inch display, targeting users who use their phones extensively for both work and play.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Reckoners (Rock & Soul): Blues On The Beach and 10 more events
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested significantly to enhance its network, extending its reach from large cities to smaller towns. According to Ookla Speedtest, T-Mobile provides America's best mobile network in the US.

articles.title: The adidas adiZero Goukana Debuts in Striking 'Yellow/Light Yellow'
articles.summary: Adidas is launching the adiZero Goukana 'Yellow' sneaker on August 1st, priced at $160 USD. The sneaker features Lightstrike cushioning for responsiveness and comfort, along with a suede, mesh, and reflective synthetic upper in yellow. The design is inspired by racing culture and includes a bulbous midsole.

articles.title: 32 Inexpensive Beauty Products Reviewers Have Basically Sworn Their Allegiance To
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new beauty and personal care products.  Monday Haircare launches Dry Shampoo with keratin, Catrice introduces "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener in four shades, and E.l.f's Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara provides a smudge-proof extension for lashes. These products aim to address specific needs like frizz control, dark circles, and fragile lashes, respectively.

articles.title: Amazon sale countdown on the best washing machines begins: Save big on top models from ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Amazon is preparing for a sale on various washing machines. Top-rated models with inverter motors, quick wash cycles, and larger drum capacities will be available. The sale will feature discounts on washing machines from big brands with advanced features.

articles.title: 33 Products That'll Have The Most Selective People Convinced
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: The content introduces a variety of new consumer products, including a Retinol body lotion containing vitamins A and E, ferulic acid, shea butter, and green tea and The Pink Stuff, a cleaning product for removing stains, grease, and grime. Additionally, Medicube's "Zero Pore" Pads are highlighted, containing lactic acid, salicylic acid, and a dual-textured surface for controlling sebum and exfoliating dead skin.

articles.title: Sainsbury's 'perfect' and 'amazing' £18 dress 'looks great on'
articles.summary: Sainsbury's 'Tu' clothing range launched the Brown Contrast Sleeveless Midaxi Jersey Dress, priced at £18 and available in sizes 8-24. The dress features a sleeveless cut, midaxi length, and jersey material, receiving positive customer reviews for its fit and style.

articles.title: Sainsbury's 'very flattering' £18 dress gets 'so many compliments'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Sainsbury's Tu clothing range introduced the 'Brown Contrast Sleeveless Midaxi Jersey Dress,' priced at £18 and available in sizes 8-24. This midaxi-length, sleeveless dress is made of jersey material and has received positive customer feedback for its fit and quality, with availability both in stores and online.

articles.title: FreshService Presents a 'Heavy Duty' FW25 Collection
articles.summary: FreshService is launching its FW25 'Heavy Duty' collection, emphasizing durability, layering, and modularity. Key pieces include mountain parkas, fishing jackets, and corduroy pants crafted from technical fabrics like SOLOTEX® and PERTEX®. The collection also features accessories like flannel trapper caps and cotton twill bucket hats.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 review: Mighty, light and wonderfully slight
articles.author: Ben Johnston
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold 7, featuring a streamlined design, a 200-megapixel main camera, and an improved processor. The phone has larger and sharper displays compared to the Galaxy Z Fold 6.  It has 512GB Storage, 12GB Memory, 4400 mAh Battery

articles.title: PLTFRM Launches AI Virtual Human Livestreaming, Increasing Sales of BROTHER Printers by 30%
articles.author: PLTFRM
articles.summary: Brother, a printer brand, increased e-commerce sales by 30% and reduced livestreaming costs by 80% by adopting PLTFRM's AI-powered virtual human livestream technology across its online flagship stores on JD.com and Tmall. PLTFRM's AI Virtual Human Livestreaming Service provides end-to-end support for avatar creation, product upload, scripting, audience engagement, and multi-platform integration.

articles.title: Home Bargains' 'fab' £2.99 item 'adds a warm touch to any room'
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Home Bargains has launched a new collection of summer-fragranced candles, the Santa De Cruz collection, priced at £2.99 each, with scents like Cherry Blossom and Vanilla Almond.  Additionally, the store introduced watermelon and cherry lip balms for £1.99, which gained popularity on social media.

articles.title: Iimo Watch Phone X10: Freedom and Peace of Mind for Kids and Parents
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Imoo has launched the Imoo Watch Phone X10, a smartwatch designed for children. The X10 features a dustproof and stain-resistant design with an anti-bluelight screen, a 740mAh battery, two-way calling, GPS tracking, an SOS button, safe zones, and voice messaging. It is now available at Popular stores across Singapore and can also be purchased directly from Imoo's online store for $499.

articles.title: 31 Responsible Purchases That'll Make You Feel Like An Adult
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The article introduces several new products, including a WD-40 pen for precise lubrication, an aligner cleaner foam for oral hygiene, Howard Products Feed-N-Wax wood polish and Windex outdoor glass cleaner. There is also a battery storage caddy for organizing batteries and a microchip pet feeder.

articles.title: 2025 AI Expo Kicks Off in Suzhou to Spotlight Industry Innovation
articles.author: PR Newswire
org: New Generation AI Industry Technology Innovation Strategic Alliance
articles.summary: The 7th AI Product & Application Expo in Suzhou, China featured over 20 high-profile product launches, with a "Black Tech" experience zone showcasing more than 200 cutting-edge technologies from over 20 companies. The expo focused on themes like embodied intelligence, digital transformation, and industrial AI, fostering industry collaboration and innovation.

articles.title: హైదరాబాద్ వాసులకు గుడ్‌న్యూస్.. ఇక ఇంటి నుంచే సేవలు, ఒక్క క్లిక్‌తోనే..!
articles.summary: GHMC is launching a new website and mobile app. This new service aims to improve citizen services.

articles.title: 22 Cooling Bedroom Products For Sweaty Sleepers
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: The article presents a variety of new cooling and sleep-enhancing products including a Purple mattress with adaptive grid technology, a ChiliPAD sleep system for temperature regulation, and a Sheex x Brrr° sleep mask designed with sweat-wicking fabric. These products are aimed at providing comfortable and consistent sleep conditions.

articles.title: Discover the Innovation & Technology Behind HONOR Magic V5 Ultra-slim Design
articles.author: bizbahrain
articles.summary: HONOR is launching the HONOR Magic V5, an ultra-slim foldable phone, in the Middle East. This flagship foldable features an ultra-slim design.

articles.title: 36 Useful 'Most Wished For' Amazon Products That'll Inspire You To Make An Impulse Buy (Or Two)
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Amazon showcases a selection of "Most Wished For" products, including the Owala Freesip water bottle with a unique straw and spout design, OPI RapiDry Quick Dry Nail Polish for fast manicures, Anua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil for clearer skin, and the Ninja Creami for homemade desserts. Additionally, it features the Bissell Little Green machine for stain removal and Tushbaby's hip carrier for parents.

articles.title: Call of Duty Free Download for Xbox Owners: Modern Warfare 2 & 3 Surprise Launch
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Activision and Microsoft have launched a limited-time free trial for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II and Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III on the Xbox store. This trial provides access to curated multiplayer modes and maps until August 6th, 2025, and aims to re-engage players ahead of the release of Call of Duty: Black Ops 6.

articles.title: How a Chinese Brand Reshaped Hong Kong's Food Delivery Scene
articles.author: New York Times
articles.summary: Meituan launched its Keeta food delivery service in Hong Kong as part of its global expansion strategy. Keeta has already impacted the market by displacing a competitor.

articles.title: SOFTSWISS Launches First Casino-Sportsbook Platform in South Africa
articles.author: Inside Bitcoins
articles.summary: SOFTSWISS is partnering with Mzansibet. This collaboration marks the debut of SOFTSWISS's offerings through Mzansibet.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 already "out-of-stock" in many markets amid unprecedented demand
articles.author: International Business Times
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold7 foldable smartphone, which has experienced high demand in India, resulting in out-of-stock situations in several markets. The Galaxy Z Fold7's success and quick liquidation of stocks across regions indicates a successful product introduction.

articles.title: Number of generative AI services developed in China surges
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: ByteDance's Doubao and DeepSeek, generative AI services, have been widely adopted. Individual users can easily access these services online and via mobile applications, signaling their introduction and availability.

articles.title: Tesco's cosy Dryrobe alternative with snug fleece lining is back–but won't be for long
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Tesco F&F has made its Dryrobe alternative available online for the first time. This move anticipates high demand and a potential quick sell-out of the product.

articles.title: L.O.L. Surprise!™ Unveils New Eye Spy Series™ Collection of Dolls Packed with Mystery, Imagination, and ...
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: L.O.L. Surprise!™ has launched the Eye Spy Series™ mystery-themed dolls. These dolls incorporate code-cracking elements to encourage imaginative play.

articles.title: The next Nintendo Direct has been announced – here's when and where you can watch it
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo announced the next Nintendo Direct showcase. These showcases often contain information about new products or services.

articles.title: The Next Nintendo Direct Is Coming Very Soon
articles.author: Coming Soon
articles.summary: Nintendo will air a Partner Showcase featuring third-party Nintendo Switch and Switch 2 games. The presentation will reveal upcoming games for the handheld hybrid console.

articles.title: Unlocking Value: The Real Story Behind a Free Airdrop
articles.summary: Aixovia leverages airdrops to distribute their AI and blockchain technology directly to users, fostering community building and engagement. By distributing tokens, Aixovia allows users to test and interact with their ecosystem. Aixovia explores AI to target airdrops more effectively and establish strategic partnership between the project and users.
